questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a fundamental concept of Object-Oriented Programming?
Which of these is a design principle that promotes separating concerns into different modules?
What is the purpose of a Use Case Diagram?
options: To show the structure of classes
To represent functional requirements of a system
questions.answer: To represent functional requirements of a system
